Html:
Hi,

Iam thinking about using Gmap for a heat map like application. I have a set of coordinates, which are supposed to be used to generate heatpoints and display on said gmap.

After searching both here and on google, i found this old blog which now is down:
(Dylanvester)
http://web.archive.org/web/20130415062041/http://dylanvester.com/post/Creating-Heat-Maps-with-NET-20-(C-Sharp).aspx


It seems like it was the easiest way to generate the heat itself.

What is the best way to generate a heat map from a list of coordinates, where the map are zoom-able and drag-able. Are there any of you, who have experience or ideas to how it could be done?
I don't think an overlay would be the best approach, since it would be hard to draw on a bitmap at the exact location from latlng and then match it to the map through overlay.



Ideas are more than welcome - Thank you.


EDIT: i went with gheat.net
